Tutorials
===============
.. In the codelabs.rst, replace the url in src.

############################
SQL Training [Example]
############################

.. Use this to embed codelabs, tutorials, PPTs, and other iFrames.

.. raw:: html
  
  <iframe src="https://uber-academy.vertabelo.com/" width="900", height="800" frameborder="2" scrolling="no" marginheight="0" marginwidth="0">
  </iframe>

.. raw:: html

   <br/><hr class="style14" />

.. raw:: html

   <br/><hr class="style14" />   


############################
Google Codelabs [Example]
############################

..  Use this to embed codelabs, tutorials, PPTs (iFrame).

.. raw:: html

    <iframe 
    src="https://codelabs.developers.google.com/codelabs/accelerated-mobile-pages-advanced/index.html#0" width="900", height="800" frameborder="2" scrolling="no" marginheight="0" marginwidth="0"></iframe>

.. Use this to add a line/section divider.

.. raw:: html

   <br/><hr class="style14" />

.. Use this to add a line/section divider.  

############################
Uber Codelabs [Example]
############################

.. raw:: html

 <iframe src="https://codelabs.uberinternal.com/codelab/101" width="900", height="800" frameborder="2" scrolling="no" marginheight="0" marginwidth="0"></iframe>
